Respiratory Viruses in Minnesota

Tracking respiratory virus trends through hospitalization, laboratory, and wastewater surveillance

This dashboard combines data from Minnesota's respiratory virus surveillance systems to provide a comprehensive view of viral activity across the state. The visualization includes hospitalization rates, laboratory test results, and wastewater monitoring data to track trends in COVID-19, influenza, RSV, and other respiratory viruses.

Statewide Hospitalizations Since 2022

Weekly hospitalization rates by pathogen from Minnesota Department of Health surveillance data.

Loading hospitalization data...

Laboratory System Molecular Data (1 Year)

Weekly laboratory detections by pathogen from Minnesota's molecular testing surveillance system.

Loading laboratory data...

UMN Wastewater Data Since 2022

COVID-19 hospitalizations, ICU admissions, and viral load measurements from University of Minnesota wastewater surveillance.

Loading wastewater data...

Explore Respiratory Virus Data

Filter and explore respiratory virus surveillance data including infection rates, seasonal patterns, and demographic breakdowns. This interactive dashboard will provide insights into virus circulation patterns and public health trends.

Data loading functionality coming soon...

Data Sources

Respiratory Virus Hospitalization Surveillance Network (RESP-NET). (2025). Viral Respiratory Illness in Minnesota. [Data set]. Minnesota Department of Health. https://www.health.state.mn.us/diseases/respiratory/stats/index.html

Background

Resilience Continuum is a project by Claire Nyquist which explores science through data visualization, fiction, and graphic design.
